title: Love For The Game
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss what is next for the Lakers following a disastrous season, what teams they have faith in for the playoffs, why James Harden's struggles have followed him into Philly, and the NFL's new overtime rules, all that and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
